<Heading
  as={"h1"}

  children={"Get a Model"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/model-svc/model/{modelId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the details of a model by its ID.

the Requires `model.view` permission.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Model ID","in":"path","name":"modelId","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
